TopicTitle: When can someone create a 1.0 hype train?

Articles.Content: Do we have to wait for a certain point of development to come by? I saw a 1.0 hype train months back, and it got locked.

When it's nearer to release then it is right now. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Trust me, the moment will come. Release will be right around the corner, and THEN the HypeTrain will appear.
Generally you start the HypeTrain around experimentals phase.
The HypeTrain keeps its own schedule, but we'll certainly let you know when it's approaching the station ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You guys should totally just have an image-macro-posting thread open at all times so certain people can have a year-round hypetrain. I mean, that's really all the thread is; just an excuse to blast images without real content...
